game.name: Mugsters
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 외계인들이 지구를 차지하고 인류를 노예로 만들었습니다. 당신만이 악랄한 위협을 막고 지구인들을 해방시켜 세계를 구할 방법을 알고 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Aliens have taken over the planet and enslaved humanity. Only you have the know-how to drive back the dastardly threat, free your fellow Earthlings and SAVE THE WORLD.

reviewHighlights.text: Little like puzzle game. Nothing crazy. Sorta fun to drive vehicles I guess.
Mugsters, developed by Reinkout Games and published by Team17 Digital Ltd, is a quirky, physics-driven action puzzle game that thrives on chaos and ex...
